title: “Temporary Building/structure” means any building/structure of whatever size and of whatever material which the Commissioner has allowed to be built as a temporary measure in accordance with Regulation No 57
clause_text: “Temporary Building/structure” means any building/structure of whatever size and of whatever material which the Commissioner has allowed to be built as a temporary measure in accordance with Regulation No 57.
